page.title: 06PLACES OF WORSHIP
page.content: There are many different types of Holy Places in Wimbledon,the most abundant being churches .There is one Synagogue along Worple Road,a Mosque in Wimbledon Park and a number of churches.In Copse Hill there is an Anglian church ,in Edge Hill there is The Sacred Heart; a Catholic church.Along Worple Road there is a Methodist church.Opposite the Synagogue there is a Christian Science Movement church,and in Mansell Road there is the Trinity United church.There is Emmanuel Church,this is probably the most beautiful church in Wimbledon.There is a Baptist church along Queens Road,opposite the police station. Wimbledon is,I think a very religious area with Christianity _in all shapes and forms being the dominant religion.
